People of all ages have a deep appreciation for Disney characters. Whenever I come across a Tigger or Winnie the Pooh stuffed animal or mug, I feel nostalgia immediately. Dollar Tree recognizes this sentiment, so it recently launched a collection inspired by those beloved childhood figures.

If you take a trip to Dollar Tree, you’ll stumble across an array of different kitchen gems, all decked out in different Disney themes.

In the home aisle, you’ll spot Winnie the Pooh, Lilo and Stitch, Mickey and Minnie Mouse-themed kitchen towels, tumblers, and pot holders. The best part? Each gem only costs $1.25.

One creator, @kittyKita35, who posts about the latest Dollar Tree deals, recently shared a clip detailing this collection, and shoppers could not contain their excitement. “I am going to every Dollar Tree in Austin to find them,” one person said. Other users went as far as to say they’ll pay whoever finds them to ship the collection to their home. “I need the stitch pot holders!!! We don’t get them in Kansas. Anyone willing to pick it up and ship it? (I’ll pay for both and a little extra for the help!!!)”

The Disney kitchen collection is currently unavailable on the Dollar Tree website. But there are many other gorgeous Valentine’s Day-themed gems if you hope to get in the holiday spirit. They’re currently selling a three-piece oven mitt and pot holder set with cartoon-looking hearts and chocolate-covered strawberries for $1.25

Dollar Tree continuously releases fun, seasonal, and limited-edition collections. If you’re interested in this Disney rollout, head to your nearest location before it sells out. Good luck!

Buy: Valentine’s Day Oven Mitts and Potholders, $1.25
